philosophy.title: A unique philosophy
philosophy.description1: Jean-Charles, an independent sports coach with over 10 years of experience, has developed a personalized approach adapted to each client. His philosophy is based on motivation, perseverance, and listening to help each person achieve physical and mental well-being.

services.title: A unique, precise, and effective method
services.description: Each person has their own metabolism, lifestyle, and needs. My mission is to provide personalized coaching to help you achieve your goals sustainably.

timing.title: Manage timing
timing.description: Manage nutrition timing for optimal results.

cycle.title: Cycle your training
cycle.description: Alternate diet and workouts to optimize results.

tension.title: Combine tension and metabolism
tension.description: Combine mechanical tension with metabolic stress.

testimonials.title: Our clients speak better than we do

clients.name: Richard Strul
clients.text: I came to JC Trainer 13 years ago with a messed-up back, a leg half-paralyzed by sciatica, and doctors saying: no more sports. Within a few months, I was back to playing badminton, volleyball, and even skiing off-piste.

clients.name: Marie Dupont
clients.text: JC Trainer completely changed my life. Thanks to him, I regained the fitness and motivation I had lost for years.

clients.name: Paul Durand
clients.text: A personalized coaching and incredible listening. Jean-Christophe really knows how to motivate and adapt exercises for everyone.
